header:
I.T. Student, Programmer,
Aspiring Game Dev, Graphic Designer, and Content Creator.
content:
Hello, There! I am WILLIAM RYAN MCDONALD. I have been coding and creating a variety of content, from video to graphics, for over a decade in my own time, ever since I was around ten or eleven.

I have experience working as a graphic designer for many teams in a wide array of scenarios, and as a developer for smaller modding development teams for some of my favorite games. My primary skills consist of Adobe Suite (Graphic Design and Editing), and Web Development (new to it), Programming.
